plot: As Granny you paddle your canoe along rivers getting bags of gold for tolls and shotgun shells. Avoid or shoot gators and spear-throwing natives.
title: Granny and the Gators
plot_es: As Granny you paddle your canoe along rivers getting bags of gold for tolls and shotgun shells. Avoid or shoot gators and spear-throwing natives.
plot_en: As Granny you paddle your canoe along rivers getting bags of gold for tolls and shotgun shells. Avoid or shoot gators and spear-throwing natives.
